summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List, or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 10 priority open recommendations for the Federal Reserve as of April 2019. For example, we recommended that the Federal Reserve improve...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System
